drivers/touch/resistive/touch.c File Reference

4-wire resistive touch driver general implementation. More...

#include <assert.h>
#include <interrupt.h>
#include <pmic.h>
#include <intc.h>
#include <touch/touch.h>
#include <cpu/touch/resistive/touch.h>
